summary: A Re-Tex of Jmenarus Crimson Twilight armor
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]YXwHI2QxTNs[/youtube]Â  [youtube]4b7bCdHC0dA[/youtube]

Description:
This is a Re-texture of the "Crimson Twilight" armor by jmenaru. I thought the armor had a subtle middle eastern/eurasian aesthetic and decided to give it regional makeover inspired by traditional clothing patterns and the surrounding landscape. In particular the "Al Dahna", a desert near central saudi-arabia known for it's somber reddish hues.

Hope you enjoy the textures and remember to endorse the mod if you like it.


Requirements:
The Original mod - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59399/


Installation:
Install the original mod in it's entirety(ESP. file, meshes and textures), then copy/paste the "Data" folder to your data directory.


Credits:
Jmenaru - For the original armor.

Bethesda - For an awesome game.
author: betterbecause
